issue.title: [C++] Add "is_nan" kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11043](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11043). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add "is_nan" kernel on the basis of "is_null" kernel signature (see arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_validity.cc) and implemented with applicator & operator like in arrow/compute/kernels/compare.cc kernels. Kernel only implemented for FloatType and DoubleType.
